txt.en: Thurindol can be found in the keep at Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should speak with Thurindol.
Ronkúrz can be found somewhere in Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should defeat Ronkúrz.
'Excellent work! So an enemy camp not far from here lies hidden on the Morgulduin? I shall muster some men and strike the camp tomorrow night. I thank you for your efforts.'
The bounty notice reads:\n\n'Rangers, we are in need of one of you to defeat Ronkúrz, a captain in the ranks of the Morgul-host. Speak with Thurindol if you plan to accept this mission.'
A bounty notice asks you to seek out Thurindol who has information about Ronkúrz, an Orc captain from the Morgul-vale.

You ask Thurindol about the bounty notice.\n\n'I gladly accept your offer to defeat Ronkúrz. He commands one of the forces that stormed Osgiliath. The last update I have on his whereabouts is that he was stationed somewhere in South Ithilien. Good luck.'
Thurindol can be found in the keep at Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should speak with Thurindol.
